context.p: It is possible to manually deploy an .ear file using the Administration Console. For this to succeed, the relevant server must be started. In the Administration Console, complete the following steps:

step.cmd: Navigate to the location of the .ear file.

info.p: The default location for the server .ear is:

step.cmd: Select the .ear file from the list and click the Next button.
Accept defaults and click the Next button.
Accept the defaults and click the Finish button.
Select the application just deployed in the Deployments list and click StartServicing all requests.

info.p: For example, point a Web browser at the URL for the deployed application e.g. https://localhost:7002/Curam.
